name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in building robust backend solutions using **Kotlin**, **Ktor**, and **Spring** frameworks, along with database management in **PostgreSQL** and integration with messaging services like **Kafka**. My technical proficiency extends to containerization with **Docker** and cloud services on **Google Cloud Platform**. I have a strong foundation in event-driven architecture and API development. 

In addition to my core backend skills, I am adept at leveraging AI capabilities for intelligent automation, driven by my hands-on experience in predictive analytics and real-time data processing solutions. I also embrace best practices in CI/CD automation to enhance development workflow efficiency. My commitment to high-quality standards is reflected in my adherence to compliance frameworks. I am a team player with strong problem-solving skills, initiative, and the ability to communicate effectively in German and English.
